title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park: Materials to Loan
body: Materials to Loan          Results   Showing results 1-2 of 2    Sort By:  Title Date         Eyewitness to War News   Eyewitness to War News is an educational video for elementary and middle school students. The Battle of Palo Alto and U.S.-Mexican War are the feature stories in this local "newscast". Segments on women, food, health, and weather compliment the top stories.    Type:Media For Loan Grade level:Fourth Grade-Eighth Grade Subjects:History, Mexican War, Military and Wartime History, Social Studies National/State Standards:Gr K-4 National Standards-Social Studies: U.S. History 2, 3Gr 5-12 National Standards-Social Studies: World History Era 7Gr 5-12 National Standards-Social Studies: U.S. HistoryÂ  Era 4 Keywords:Mexican War, news, social studies, TV        Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park Take A Hike   Explore your National Parks and teach your students U.S. geography. This easy-to-learn interactive educational game comes with lesson plans and student activities.    Type:Media For Loan Grade level:Third Grade-Eighth Grade Subjects:Geography National/State Standards:Gr K-12 National Standards-Social Studies: Geography 2 Keywords:geography, National Parks
